Class Library

java.lang.Object
  Library

public class Library
extends java.lang.Object

This is a library search program which allows the user to enter and search for library information such as books and journals.

2010/10/18
Version:

Method Detail

correctChoice

public static void correctChoice(Library lib)
Method that checks correct choice of Menu. This Method takes the user input for menu selection and checks whether it is a valid input, displaying appropriate error messages.

isEmpty

public static boolean isEmpty(Library lib)
Method that checks if library is empty. This Method simply checks if the library is empty i.e. if no journal or book exists in the library.

main

public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
Main method of "Library" class. Contains the Menu Loop in which the user can select to either Add or Search records or exit the program by calling the appropriate Methods.
